notifications.title: Weather Alert: Heavy Rain Expected
notifications.message: Heavy rainfall is expected in your area from tomorrow evening. Please take necessary precautions for your crops and ensure proper drainage in your fields.

notifications.title: Market Price Update
notifications.message: Tomato prices have increased by 15% in the local market. Current rate: â‚¹25/kg. Consider selling your produce if ready for harvest.

notifications.title: Pest Management Advisory
notifications.message: Aphid infestation detected in nearby farms. Inspect your crops regularly and apply neem oil spray as a preventive measure.

notifications.title: Government Subsidy Available
notifications.message: New subsidy scheme for drip irrigation systems is now available. Apply before December 31st to avail 50% subsidy on installation costs.

notifications.title: Soil Health Report Ready
notifications.message: Your soil analysis report is ready for download. The report shows optimal pH levels and recommends organic fertilizers for better yield.

notifications.title: Training Program: Organic Farming
notifications.message: Join our free 3-day workshop on organic farming techniques. Registration closes tomorrow. Venue: Agricultural Extension Center, timing: 10 AM to 4 PM.

notifications.title: Crop Insurance Reminder
notifications.message: Don't forget to renew your crop insurance before the deadline. Protect your harvest against natural calamities and ensure financial security.

notifications.title: Water Conservation Tips
notifications.message: With decreasing groundwater levels, implement water-saving techniques like mulching and drip irrigation to optimize water usage in your farm.

notifications.title: Fertilizer Stock Alert
notifications.message: Limited stock of NPK fertilizers available at cooperative society. Book your requirement in advance to avoid last-minute shortage.

notifications.title: Harvest Festival Celebration
notifications.message: Join us for the annual harvest festival celebration at the community center. Cultural programs, food stalls, and agricultural exhibition await you.
